main event: On 12 June 1952, Major John V. Ford reported receiving information about a strange object hovering in the sky, visible for about 15 minutes before moving off at high speed.
interesting points: The object was round or cigar-shaped and emitted bright light,The object appeared to be under intelligent control based on its maneuvering,The object was first seen at approximately 0550 hours,Several reports throughout the year from various locations indicated similar unidentified craft sightings,There is no photographic evidence available from this specific report.
sighted object: a strange object reportedly round or cigar-shaped
location: Langley Air Force Base, Virginia, USA
witness description: Major John V. Ford, Intelligence Officer, U.S. Air Force
